dialog: The rate of return on assets must not fall below the average for the industry during the first half of the year.
As far as I can tell, we meet the criteria.
Of course, we must provide proof and duplicate copies of all necessary documents. Once we've presented the evidence, the assessment should proceed quickly.
Do you know any languages besides English?
I have a limited understanding of Japanese, which shares many similarities with Chinese culture and language.
What level did you attain on the Japanese Language Proficiency Test?
I achieved Band 2 on the test, but I hope to reach the highest level, Band 1, in the future.
What seems to be the issue, Mr. Brown?
I'm not feeling well, Doctor Ford.
In what way?
I've lost my appetite, always tired, and have trouble sleeping.
Have you lost weight?
Yes, I've lost quite a bit of weight over the past month.
When was the last time you were checked by a doctor?
About two months ago.
Let me take your blood pressure. You appear pale. Don't worry, Mr. Brown, it's nothing serious. You're just a bit run down from overworking.
What should I do?
A vacation would likely do you good. Try to get outside more and get some rest. That should help.
Thank you, Doctor. I'll follow your advice.
May I see your wizarding passport, please?
